p:testcaseDefinition.p:name: EID_SERVER_B1_2_01_RestrictedID
p:testcaseDefinition.p:description: This test case checks the behavior of the eID-Server at the SAML-Interface in case the eService requests to read an attribute without having the corresponding authorization in the terminal certificate.
p:testcaseDefinition.p:clientExplanation: Configure the server to accept the certificate chain for client C. This includes the TLS, XML signature and the CV certificate.
